<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Healer's Blessing](/Spells.aspx?ID=426)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 393 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing living creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your words bless a creature with an enhanced connection to positive energy. When the target regains Hit Points from a healing spell, it regains 2 additional Hit Points.

 The target regains additional Hit Points from healer's blessing only the first time it regains HP from a given healing spell, so a spell that heals the creature repeatedly over a duration would restore additional Hit Points only once.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The additional healing increases by 2 HP.
name: Healer's Blessing
